Not a Saint or a scoundrel, the price itself knows what is respected among stalkers. Rumor has it that hidden in the Area from his dark past. Once caught in the anomaly, he began to limp and decided to change occupation. Furnish a bar near the group Debt, which has quietly become a major gathering place for veterans of the Area. The bartender has a lot of connections within the Zone and in the outside world.
Constantly drunk member of the group of Debt. Duty gave him one last chance to stay in the group, doing the job, but he's drunk and can't perform.

Good-natured humorist, his only problem is that can only shoot a hunting rifle. The rest is not even trying. Recently got in trouble in the Wild territory and lost his family rifle. Now hanging around in a bar hoping that someone will give him his gun.
A mysterious Stalker who knows a lot. Sells information at the bar.
Head of all counter-insurgency operations and operations on clearing large clusters of mutants.
The bodyguard of the master of the Arena. About his past is known only to the poor, he hates his brothers.
One of the founders of Debt and part-time chief ideologist. It was he who developed the rules and recruited almost all the key members of the Debt.

Personality-kind legendary, they say that it can be held in any part of the Zone. He takes expensive, but it's not just about the money. Not popular with his people he won't drive for any money. Veteran, knows the Area inside and out.

Hunted trade from an early age. In kindergarten sold colored pencils. The school was selling chewing gum. The Institute has a sideline selling light drugs. With the advent of the Zone have realized that this can earn good money. Is famous for the fact that they are able to establish good trade relations with the most disparate clients.
Enjoys a certain prestige among the bandits in the Area. Accomplice Hog.

Scientist, expert on anomalous phenomena. Worked in America on a secret project. Recently had been missing.

Marauder and murderer. His head was repeatedly announced the award. Once were in good relations with Duty, helped them to beat the current territory. Now lives in the wild territory and robs with his gang of lonely stalkers.
Dr. biological Sciences. Outside the Area studied pathogenic mutations in animals. In the Zone went to study the mutation of blind dogs.
One of the "heroes" group of Mercenaries. Shot with all calibers veteran. Rare psycho and sadist.
One of the commanders of "Mercenaries". The commander of group of militants who call themselves "dogs". The anarchist who despises any laws other than the laws of force.

Came to the Area in search of adventure. Mows comic book heroes of the ' 60s. It is called differently: Batman, Macho man, Black cloak, Banderacom and although the fact that he has two years and are still alive speaks for itself, but seriously it is still not perceive that it much hurt.

Fierce, angry, rude, selfish, cruel, unfeeling, cold. No one knows when and how he got into the Zone. His fear and dislike. In the Area just lives, he has no future and no past. After one of his many sorties in the Area lost his memory and very much forgotten. Can't remember where he does not remember his real name, frequent lapses in memory. For example, you may forget a new acquaintance in an hour after acquaintance, and, perceiving him as the enemy, to kill.

A CAD, a sycophant, a hypocrite, a coward. Credo Master could be called a phrase after us - the deluge. Of just trying to benefit. In all of this is very ambitious and touchy. In the Area arrived, it is as though banal did not sound, for the money. And for the second year in the Area engaged in the production of material values by any means.
Action grouping "Debt". Usually well equipped. More info is available.

This is the official recruiter of the SBU. Often sitting at the bar. This is known to all, and that if it gets too tight, you should go to him. However, after this step, the path back to honest stalkers, will be closed.

In everyday life, phlegmatic, does not Express their emotions, calm. However, when strong impressions are quick-tempered, aggressive. Intellectual. Materialist, terribly sorry about that hit the Area. After graduating from medical school, was sent to the Area where the camp of scientists required assistant neurosurgeon. Dissects the brain of the mutants and explores their psychokinetic powers. Waiting for retirement and the possibility of living in the capital away from this godforsaken place.

Incredibly lucky Stalker. Many times his group was on the verge of death, and always he was the only one who managed to escape. Stalkers infamous "unlucky talisman". For some time now to go alone.
One of the veterans of the Zone. This Stalker knows the Area like the back of your hand. Usually well-equipped and very dangerous. More info is available.

The smuggler with the experience. For a long time, hunted in Africa and South America. Spread all over the world stories about Chernobyl mutants led him to Ukraine. In a short period of time managed to take out of the restricted area several hundred stuffed mutants, for which he received the nickname "Scarecrow". In between "work" in the Area - a successful merchant. Loves Armani suits and Versace ties, but prefers Soviet guns.

Former Afghan. During one of the ambushes of the Mujahideen dramatically believed in God. After Afghan immigrates to Poland, where he entered the theological Seminary. After graduating from the Seminary some time preaching in Lviv Catholic Church. After the explosion at Chernobyl volunteers to help the victims. The last few years preaching in the Zone.

In the past the locksmith factory "kholodmash". After his wife left him, decided to commit suicide, and as man, he was religious, he chose an original way to commit suicide Zone. But survived, done enough of this here for a couple of years and among the stalkers won some credibility, thanks to its professional skills. At the moment the Master is the most competent mechanic in the Area, repair of equipment and machinery, construction of systems for the protection of storage groups and etc. etc. - his diocese. Go into any doors, powerful, simple, but rude in communication.

Ex-military Stalker, Lieutenant Colonel of internal troops. After one of the operations in the depth Zone remains one of the squad, but found evidence that they simply were all set up, sent to slaughter. Then decided never to come back, faking his own death and went to the stalkers, to deal with the problem areas of illegal. Silent, cynical, and purposeful.
Rookie. Recently in the Area. More info is available.

Dud 20 years. On the mainland of anything or anyone he left, and he decided to come here. To leave the Zone he is simply nowhere. In the Area just makes ends meet. Many stalkers have some amount of money. The Area goes very often, but never one more often attach themselves to groups of stalkers. But few people want to take it, because it is only extra burden. Khabar collects very rare. Lives on handouts from other stalkers and is therefore in debt.
Stalker veteran. Possible well equipped. More info is available.
Stalker veteran. Possible well equipped. More info is available.

Oleg "Fiend," Gusarov. Former "black beret", he served in the Belotserkovskaya Spetsnaz brigade. Re-enlisted, Sergeant, in the specialty sniper and Demoman. As the soul - "a lone wolf". The Zone takes never teammates, preferring to act alone. Many times he was offered to join clans - always flatly refused for this reason.

A student from the physics Department, went in the fifth year of the Institute in the Area of earnings. A lover to show off their "scientific" knowledge and reason about abstract philosophical topics. For this show off his stalkers and dislike. But overall not a bad guy. Still believes in high ideals.

Sparrow 27. Cunning, farsighted, but sometimes makes mistakes. Sometimes sneaky. In General, leaves a dual impression. Thin and pale. In the Zone came out of curiosity and gave myself a promise two years in the Area and go home. But so here and remained. In his first foray into the Area has managed to pass without devices on the field, completely covered with anomalies, not knowing about them. When he reported it, he could not recover. Since then celebrates the day (October 9) as his second birthday.

The Goblin, as he was called brother, came to the young idealist. But a few years of living on the brink of death had made him cynical realist. Considers the area home and those who did not pass the test area - unworthy to live on Earth.
Writes about the Area of essays and stories under the pseudonym of Arkady. In the past the journalist, meticulous, strict, but fair. Enjoys a certain respect among stalkers.
